item.description:
The third in our series of jam sessions -- If you sing or play an instrument, we'd love to have you come and join us! We'll likely have guitars, hand drums, keyboard and a microphone with a small amp. Rock/jazz/folk/pop standards are the usual fare.

Our member Bob Trebra has graciously offered to learn any specifically requested songs and says:

" please let everyone know that if they have a song they want to sing , to please E-mail me (bob.trebra@comcast.net) with it along with the Artist's name and I will type up the Stage sheet in the key of the actual recording. (unless they give me the Key they want to sing it in) This way I can practice/learn it. I will then forward it back on an E.M attachment so they can take a copy for them selves. This way we don't spend half the time looking up songs on the Internet like last time. I will need their requests ASAP so I'm not bombarded with songs a few days b/4 we get together. :~)"

I'll be serving nibbles and wine/beer/soft drinks as usual (and possibly some birthday cake, too!)
item.how_to_find_us: White colonial house in the historic district of Chaplin

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Birthday Jam Session @Victoria's
